thread.title: Ground News - Pope is called Satan's servant for blessing gays
thread.title_full: Ground News - Pope is called Satan's servant for blessing gays

author: UOL
title: Ground News - Pope is called Satan's servant for blessing gays
text:
Summary by UOL Conservative Catholic Church leaders have spoken out in recent days against Pope Francis ' attitude of allowing same-sex couples to ban. On Thursday (21), Carlo Maria Vigan, archbishop and former apostolic nuncio to the United States, accused the pontiff of being a “servant of Satan”. Read more (12/23/2023) Share menu More
